title: 386.72 ABSTRACTER'S CERTIFICATE AS PRIMA FACIE EVIDENCE.
text: Any abstract of title, continuation thereof, or certificate showing ownership of, or interest in, or liens upon any lands in the state of Minnesota, whether registered or not, certified to be true and correct by any licensed abstracter under the signature and seal of such abstracter shall be received by the courts of this state as prima facie evidence of the existence or nonexistence of records, the content and filing indicated on such abstract, continuation thereof, or certificate hereinbefore described.
